config.prompt:
Prince Derek Kendrick of Alaron, son of King Derid Kendrick. A capable fighter, a competent diplomat, and an aptitude for druidic magic. Some background about his home and his father: Caer Callidyr (Castle Callidyr)
At the center of Callidyr stands the imposing Caer Callidyr. The castle, perched on a hill overlooking the city.

Caer Callidyr is not just a military stronghold but also a cultural center, private quarters for scholars, druids, and advisors. The castle has lush gardens are enchanted by the druids of the Earthmother, as well as training grounds for the Moonshaes’ elite guard.
1491 DR. By this time, the Moonshaes are facing increased threats from various factions, including pirates, raiders, and creatures come from the Shadowfell. King Derid strives to maintain the unity of the Moonshaes and preserve the legacy of the Kendrick family, leading from Caer Callidyr on the isle of Alaron.

Derid is seen as a relatively capable leader, balancing the interests of both the Ffolk and Northlanders, much like his ancestor Queen Alicia did. His reign is marked by external pressures, particularly from the mainland of Faerûn, as well as internal conflicts among the islands. The politics of the Moonshaes during his time are complicated by the ongoing struggles between the Ffolk, Northlanders, and growing threats from outside forces, including the dark influences of the Fey and monstrous creatures in the isles.

Kendrick Family Crest
The Kendrick family crest incorporates elements from both the Ffolk and Northlander heritage

The crest retains the mighty oak tree at its core

1. Raven: Perched on one of the oak’s branches

2. Wolf and Bear: Flanking the oak on either side are the images of a wolf and a bear

3. Knots: Encircling the crest is a knotwork pattern

- The crest’s royal blue background, representing loyalty and justice, is now overlaid with silver-etched designs, each symbol prominent against the blue.
- A crescent moon hovers over the top of the oak

magic_items.name: Cloak of Protection
magic_items.description: While wearing this cloak, Prince Derek gains a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

attuned_items.name: Amulet of the Earthmother
attuned_items.description: A sacred amulet blessed by druids of the Earthmother. While attuned, it grants advantage on one Constitution saving throw per long rest and allows the wearer to cast Speak with Animals once per day.

assumptions: As a royal heir and capable fighter, Prince Derek is equipped with high-quality martial gear appropriate to a noble of Alaron.
Magic items are selected to support survivability and druidic aptitude without exceeding a mid-tier power level.
Heraldic and druidic elements are included to reflect House Kendrick and Earthmother traditions.
